item.title: Earle-Sears' Virginia campaign bus catches fire
item.description: Lt. Gov. Winsome Earle-Sears' campaign for governor is catching fire -- literally.

item.title: Gov. Moore pledges $10 million for Maryland's food banks amid state of emergency
item.description: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore declared a state of emergency on Day 30 of the government shutdown as federal food aid benefits face a funding lapse.

item.title: Trump caps refugees at 7,500, earmarks most slots for White South Africans

item.title: Ciattarelli snatches another Democratic endorsement in final stretch of dead-heat New Jersey race
